creator.description:
WIP
Mission: keep bsky safe from authoritarians and disinfo
Startup admin: stevetownsend0.bsky.social
Platform reporting is still good for gore posters, threats etc.
This is a fast track to clean infospace. You can report to both in one pass.

locales.description: Non-harmful parody account, labeled only to avoid confusion and distraction
locales.name: Parody

locales.description: Unconstructive conflict within the fella community, possibly designed to distract from more important things
locales.name: Infighting

locales.description: Rude or impolite, including crude language and disrespectful comments, without constructive purpose.
locales.name: Abusive

locales.description: Insincere content or bulk actions aimed at gaining followers, including frequent follows, posts, and likes.
locales.name: Engagement Farmer
